title: 【已解決】gradlew build後運行mod時報NoSuchFieldError錯誤
author: SilverMing

replies.author: 饕餮魍魉枭蹀躞
replies.txt_content:
this.blockIcon = reg.registerIcon("portal");复制代码
RegisterIcon不是这样用的哦
要是
this.blockIcon = reg.registerIcon("modID:portal");复制代码
